title._content: Misses McAdoo, Britton, et. al. on "Lusitania"  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Misses McAdoo, Britton, et. al. on "Lusitania" [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Nona McAdoo (daughter of William Gibbs McAdoo, Secretary of the Treasury under President Woodrow Wilson) with Miss Katherine Britton, departing for France on the Lusitania where they planned to serve as nurses. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012 and NewYork Times, January 31, 1915) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: World War, 1914-1918. Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18324 Call Number: LC-B2- 3369-5a
